name: untitled rpg (billydotcom)
description:
This is a game that I am currently developing as part of my studies.

It is a surrealistic dystopian RPG where you play as a man or woman who can shoot very powerful beams out of his or her head.

Currently, this game features two small towns populated with money and birds, as well as an overworld featuring a nicely appointed shipping container motel for rest and relaxation.

WASD to move. Press space when under a bird to punch and shoot a beam.

When starting the game for the first time, be sure to hit "done editing" to save your profile.
